alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale; Henry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 12:16PM CDT until April 05 at 1:15PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Dale County in southeastern Alabama... Northern Henry County in southeastern Alabama... Coffee County in southeastern Alabama... West central Clay County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 215 PM EDT/115 PM CDT/. * At 115 PM EDT/1215 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Clayton to near Andalusia, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Daleville, Elba, Abbeville, Enterprise, Fort Rucker, Ozark, Level Plains, Newton, New Brockton, Ariton, Lee, Clayhatchee, Kinston, Carl Folsom A/p, Hooper Stage Field, Gerald, Camp Humming Hills, Cairns Aaf, Camp Alaflo Bsa and Thomas Mill Creek. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 PM EDT/200 PM CDT/ for southeastern Alabama. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 700 PM EDT/600 PM CDT/ for southwestern Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 PM EDT/200 PM CDT/ for southeastern Alabama. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 700 PM EDT/600 PM CDT/ for southwestern Georgia.
